analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.mintTokensToEralyInvestors (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#570-580):
	External calls:
	- i < presale.totalInvestors() (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#574-579)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- earlyInvestorsMintedTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#579-580)

Crowdsale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#556-570) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#567-568)
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#568-569)

Crowdsale.mintTokensToEralyInvestors (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#570-580) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#578-579)
	-token.transfer(investorAddress,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#579)

Crowdsale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#581-598) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol)
	-token.transfer(foundersTokensWallet,foundersTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol)
	-token.mint(this,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol)
	-token.transfer(bountyTokensWallet,bountyTokens) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol)

Crowdsale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-alienToken.transfer(multisigWallet,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol)

Crowdsale.mintTokensToEralyInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- i < presale.totalInvestors() (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#574-579)

Crowdsale.mintTokensToEralyInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- investorAddress = presale.investors(i) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#575)

Crowdsale.mintTokensToEralyInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- invested = presale.balanceOf(investorAddress) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#575-576)

Crowdsale.mintTokensToEralyInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.mint(this,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#578-579)

Crowdsale.mintTokensToEralyInvestors has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(investorAddress,tokensWithBonus) (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#579)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/19/0x417f0b9133a8388fdb4ffa14e0c41638db7b6185.sol#87-92) is not in mixedCase
